channel.title: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!
channel.description:
Court Wizard Unique Day Abilities Time Slow 1 Time Use Increases Day Length by 30 seconds and another trial to be put up (announced when done to all as "The Court Wizard has slowed down time, adding time and another trial may be cast!"
This ability is primarily a lategame one time use when you are down to the last few members and your court cannot decide on who to pick, this extends BD time to discuss so they can come down to an agreement. This also lets an additional trial be held if they realise they selected the wrong target.
Night Abilities Mirror Image 1 Time Use Create a second copy of a character, the first time they are attacked at night the copy dies instead of the user, lasts until attacked
And extremely powerful 1 Time Use, this lets the court wizard make one person gain the "death immune" trait with 1 use, if you find the prince put this on him to make him more powerful, or if you mistakenly put it on the assassin, make your lives harder!
Dispel Unlimited Use Cures Poison/Bleeding and prevents the user from being occupied/redirected
Similar to the Physician however this cannot save a target who is attacked that night, this can only remove Poison/Bleeding. Useful since I believe the CW should share the same spawn% with a Physician so we do not crowd the support role to much.
Sage Day Abilities Tornado Unlimited Use Make someone swap positions with another user.
Tornado, but a day ability, this is so that the Sage can swap in secret while also "proving" himself with his fake abilities.
Night Abilities Mirror Weapon 1 Time Use Lets the Assassin attack again, this stacks with double kill for a potential 3 attacks in 1 night!
A simple assassin empower to match the power of the BD version of the ability.
False Dispel Makes the user believe his poison/bleeding is cured, however it still kills them 1 day later(if it was to kill them that night, it gets extended 1 day)
This lets a Sage "Prove himself" with a heal, however all this does is extend the duration of the bleed/poison and dosnt let the user know they are still bleeding/poisoned. When they die they will realise it was all a dupe.

item.title: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Strathlomond:

Court Wizard

Unique

Day Abilities

Time Slow

1 Time Use

Increases Day Length by 30 seconds and another trial to be put up (announced when done to all as “The Court Wizard has slowed down time, adding time and another trial may be cast!”

Already too confirmable.

Strathlomond:

Night Abilities

Mirror Image

1 Time Use

Create a second copy of a character, the first time they are attacked at night the copy dies instead of the user, lasts until attacked

Uhh Don’t understand this one

Strathlomond:

Dispel

Unlimited Use

Cures Poison/Bleeding and prevents the user from being occupied/redirected

I mean it’s a nerfed type of heal

Strathlomond:

Sage

Day Abilities

Tornado

Unlimited Use

Make someone swap positions with another user.

Tornado, but a day ability, this is so that the Sage can swap in secret while also “proving” himself with his fake abilities.

??? This is not a good idea, giving CW a confirmable ability but not the same one for sage is just not good imo, also how would sage confirm himself when CW has no tornado??

Strathlomond:

Mirror Weapon

1 Time Use

Lets the Assassin attack again, this stacks with double kill for a potential 3 attacks in 1 night!

Too OP imo

Strathlomond:

False Dispel

Makes the user believe his poison/bleeding is cured, however it still kills them 1 day later(if it was to kill them that night, it gets extended 1 day)

This one I do kind of like

I agree with the others cool ideas but imo they should be made unconfrimable or given to other classes

Read full topic
item.source: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!

item.title: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!
item.dc:creator: RawkHawk
item.description:
Having Tornado as a day ability is a horrible mistake. Tornado is already a very powerful and swingy ability. Using it incorrectly will lead to massive mistakes on everyone’s part. We already have CWs who tornado just for the fun of it. If Tornado remains, it MUST be a night ability, as it allows Sage to combo it with team mates and CW to actually think about who and why he’s swapping.

Everyone else went over the rest of the major problems with your abilities.

Read full topic
item.source: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!

item.title: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
I mean imo Tornado is a good ability if you actually had some way of knowing when might be a good point to use it. I’d be fine to see it removed but I’m also good with it being kept.

Read full topic
item.source: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!

item.title: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!
item.dc:creator: Strathlomond
item.description:
Potentially scrap Time Slow and have Tornado as a day ability for both but with only unlimited use for the sage?

Read full topic
item.source: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!

item.title: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
And what’s the point of a sage ability solely to fakeclaim CW when CW can publicly confirm themselves as BD to literally everyone.

Me: I claim CW
Everyone: Use time thingy to prove
Me: Shit.

Read full topic
item.source: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!

item.title: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
We’re removing the confirmability from the game for a reason. Nobody wants a game where there are no good fakeclaims.

Read full topic
item.source: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!

item.title: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
Strathlomond:

Time Slow

1 Time Use

Increases Day Length by 30 seconds and another trial to be put up (announced when done to all as “The Court Wizard has slowed down time, adding time and another trial may be cast!”

A situational confirmable ability. We removed all instances of this from most clases now.

Strathlomond:

Night Abilities

Mirror Image

1 Time Use

Create a second copy of a character, the first time they are attacked at night the copy dies instead of the user, lasts until attacked

Oh boy I can’t wait for the Prince meta to actually be viable because Unseen and Cult have no way to deal with this.

Strathlomond:

Dispel

Unlimited Use

Cures Poison/Bleeding and prevents the user from being occupied/redirected

Similar to the Physician however this cannot save a target who is attacked that night, this can only remove Poison/Bleeding. Useful since I believe the CW should share the same spawn% with a Physician so we do not crowd the support role to much.

Oh wow a worse heal that’s even more boring than Magcal Barrier.

Strathlomond:

Tornado

Unlimited Use

Make someone swap positions with another user.

Tornado, but a day ability, this is so that the Sage can swap in secret while also “proving” himself with his fake abilities.

Confirms a Sage in the game with it existing, because CW swaps are easily distinguishable from Drunk debauching.

Strathlomond:

Night Abilities

Mirror Weapon

1 Time Use

Lets the Assassin attack again, this stacks with double kill for a potential 3 attacks in 1 night!

A simple assassin empower to match the power of the BD version of the ability.

3 KPN on a conversion faction is far too busted for Unseen. This ability fits better for cult, but the point of Unseen is that they have stronger converts but weaker ‘key roles’ and are smaller.

Strathlomond:

False Dispel

Makes the user believe his poison/bleeding is cured, however it still kills them 1 day later(if it was to kill them that night, it gets extended 1 day)

So it dosen’t help whatsoever, really, because what kind of Unseen member would actually attack the same person as the person that was healed.

It’d basically incriminate the CW claim, even if it technically dosen’t.

Some cool ideas but sorely unbalanced and swingy.

Read full topic
item.source: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!

item.title: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!
item.dc:creator: Strathlomond
item.description:
Id say you can only have 4 healers in a game max as a standard, which is what I would want as I agree 6 healers is to many. Also the way Mirror Image works is like the Inquisitors Holy Blessing. So you add 1 Death Immune charge to them, meaning an assassin kill will fail to kill them, but the next time they attack it will.

The super confirmable ability is a one time use, which I think is fair that most classes have a way to confirm themselves once.

Read full topic
item.source: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!

item.title: Court Wizard rework idea, master of magic!
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
Alright time to break out the old analysis machine.

Strathlomond:

Court Wizard

Unique

Day Abilities

Time Slow

1 Time Use

Increases Day Length by 30 seconds and another trial to be put up (announced when done to all as “The Court Wizard has slowed down time, adding time and another trial may be cast!”

VERY Confirmable. Get that heckle out of my swamp.

Strathlomond:

Night Abilities

Mirror Image

1 Time Use

Create a second copy of a character, the first time they are attacked at night the copy dies instead of the user, lasts until attacked

And extremely powerful 1 Time Use, this lets the court wizard make one person gain the “death immune” trait with 1 use, if you find the prince put this on him to make him more powerful, or if you mistakenly put it on the assassin, make your lives harder!

Explain further. I dont get it :V

Strathlomond:

Dispel

Unlimited Use

Cures Poison/Bleeding and prevents the user from being occupied/redirected

Similar to the Physician however this cannot save a target who is attacked that night, this can only remove Poison/Bleeding. Useful since I believe the CW should share the same spawn% with a Physician so we do not crowd the support role to much.

Somebody has said this before , so i guess i will. we dont want 6 healers in one game. Most Physicians and Alchemists only get to heal because of poison anyway.

Strathlomond:

False Dispel

Makes the user believe his poison/bleeding is cured, however it still kills them 1 day later(if it was to kill them that night, it gets extended 1 day)

This lets a Sage “Prove himself” with a heal, however all this does is extend the duration of the bleed/poison and dosnt let the user know they are still bleeding/poisoned. When they die they will realise it was all a dupe.

oof

It has some cool ideas tho

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Strathlomond
item.description:
Court Wizard
Unique
Day Abilities
Time Slow
1 Time Use
Increases Day Length by 30 seconds and another trial to be put up (announced when done to all as “The Court Wizard has slowed down time, adding time and another trial may be cast!”

This ability is primarily a lategame one time use when you are down to the last few members and your court cannot decide on who to pick, this extends BD time to discuss so they can come down to an agreement. This also lets an additional trial be held if they realise they selected the wrong target.

Night Abilities
Mirror Image
1 Time Use

And extremely powerful 1 Time Use, this lets the court wizard make one person gain the “death immune” trait with 1 use, if you find the prince put this on him to make him more powerful, or if you mistakenly put it on the assassin, make your lives harder!

Unlimited Use

Similar to the Physician however this cannot save a target who is attacked that night, this can only remove Poison/Bleeding. Useful since I believe the CW should share the same spawn% with a Physician so we do not crowd the support role to much.

Sage
Day Abilities
Tornado
Unlimited Use
Make someone swap positions with another user.

Tornado, but a day ability, this is so that the Sage can swap in secret while also “proving” himself with his fake abilities.

Night Abilities
Mirror Weapon
1 Time Use
Lets the Assassin attack again, this stacks with double kill for a potential 3 attacks in 1 night!

A simple assassin empower to match the power of the BD version of the ability.

False Dispel
Makes the user believe his poison/bleeding is cured, however it still kills them 1 day later(if it was to kill them that night, it gets extended 1 day)

This lets a Sage “Prove himself” with a heal, however all this does is extend the duration of the bleed/poison and dosnt let the user know they are still bleeding/poisoned. When they die they will realise it was all a dupe.
